title: Bug 121687: Exception thrown when exporting data from a table inside a grid cell
OB: When attempting to export data from a table that is located inside a grid cell, the application throws an exception. The exception occurs during the export process.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 
1. Insert a grid into the application. 
2. Create a table inside one of the grid cells. 
3. Attempt to export the data from the table.
